item.title: The mesmerizing, irregular Munsell solid
item.description: As part of my Project-in-Residence series

item.title: Why decarbonising concrete is key to saving the planet
item.description: Introduction Welcome to the first article in a 3-part series about the cement & concrete industries and their place in the climate fight. It provides a general introduction to the subject, with some surprising facts I discovered along the way. This is a personal perspective and is subject to change based on feedback and further discussions. Feel free to reach out! I’ve been working for the past year with Vicat, (sidenote: For the anecdote, Louis Vicat is the inventor of one of the first modern cement formulations in 1817!
